Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: notInForceReason SHALL be required if insurance inforce is not in force
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: notInForceReason is not provided when Insurance is not in force

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim care team sequence SHALL be unique within a claim
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim care team sequence is not unique within the submitted claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse - ClaimResponse.request SHALL refer to the related existing claim request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse request field refers to a non-existent claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim - claim.item.detail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/dental-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=oral
Claim - claim.item.detail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/institutional-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=institutional
Claim - claim.item.detail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/pharmacy-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=pharmacy
Claim - claim.item.detail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/professional-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=professional
Claim - claim.item.detail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/vision-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=vision
Claim - claim.item.detail.subdetail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/dental-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=oral
Claim - claim.item.detail.subdetail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/institutional-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=institutional
Claim - claim.item.detail.subdetail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/pharmacy-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=pharmacy
Claim - claim.item.detail.subdetail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/professional-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=professional
Claim - claim.item.detail.subdetail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/vision-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=vision
Claim - claim.item.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/dental-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=oral
Claim - claim.item.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/institutional-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=institutional
Claim - claim.item.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/pharmacy-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=pharmacy
Claim - claim.item.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/professional-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=professional
Claim - claim.item.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from the (http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/vision-billing) adopted by nphies if Claim.type=vision
ClaimResponse item SHALL correspond to an existing item sequence in the related claim
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse item is not corresponding to an existing item sequence in the related claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item SHALL be required and not empty if ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse item is not provided when ClaimResponse outcome="complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.payment SHALL exist only if claim.use=claim
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse payment is provided even when Claim use is not "claim"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.total SHALL be required if Claim.use=Claim and ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse total is not provided when Claim use is "claim" and ClaimResponse outcome is "complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When Claim.use is either "preauthorization" or "claim" and ClaimResponse.outcome is not equal to "error" then ClaimResponse.total SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse total is not provided when ClaimResponse outcome is not equal to error

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: detail.request SHALL refer to an existing submitted claim
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation detail request does not refer to an existing submitted claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse - detailSequence in the claim response SHALL be unique within the claim response.item
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse item detailSequence in claim response is not unique within the ClaimResponse item

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse - detailSequence in the claim response SHALL match item.detail.sequence within the claim.item when Claim.item.extension.package="false"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse detailSequence does not match the Claim item detail sequence when no package is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: diagnosis.onAdmission field SHALL be required only if claim type is Institutional
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim diagnosis onAdmission is required for institutional claim type but is not to be used for non-institutional claim type

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Eligibility response request SHALL refer to the related existing Eligibility request.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CoverageElibilityResponse request field does not refer to an existing eligibility request instance

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim - Field Used only if the claim type is institutional
Field Used only if the claim use is Authorization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim fundsReserve field is used when the Claim use is not authorization
